title: The UK calls for an EV charging regulator — and the world should listen
content:
The UK’s Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders (SMMT) has called for the government to create an independent regulator to oversee the country’s public EV chargers.  Specifically, the SSMT has suggested the creation of a dedicated Office of Charging, called “Ofcharge,” to ensure that public charging infrastructure will efficiently support the transition to electric vehicles.  And you know what? It’s an amazing idea — and something the whole world should adopt. description: The Society of Motor Manufacturers and Trades has asked the government to create an independent body to oversee the UK's public EV chargers.
